name: Infinitype DEMO
description:
Infinitype DEMO (PC, MOBILE)

Infinitype is a word making game that follows a group of primates on their quest for knowledge. Go for large words and collect many bananas!

The FULL version of Infinitype is now in development. Please follow @SquirrelInkGame on Twitter for updates.

Bug reports and general feedback forms are pinned on Twitter.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SquirrelInkGame
Website: https://www.squirrelinkgames.com/
